1111010100100111 1011101101010111 1 -> sum: 1011000001111111, cout: 1

1111010110100010 0001100000110000 1 -> sum: 0000110111010011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
